parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The failure of the power steering assist can cause the steering wheel to become extremely difficult to turn, making it hard to control the vehicle, which can lead to accidents or leave the driver stranded.
symptoms: The steering wheel becomes difficult to turn
the power steering assist fault message is displayed
the vehicle loses power steering functionality
the steering wheel vibrates or shakes
the vehicle is hard to maneuver
the power steering warning light is illuminated.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The malfunction of the torque sensor can cause the power steering assist to fail, leading to the steering wheel becoming difficult to turn, which can result in accidents or leave the driver stranded.
symptoms: The power steering assist fault message is displayed
the steering wheel vibrates or shakes
the vehicle loses power steering functionality
the torque sensor malfunction error code is displayed (B2277

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The failure of the transmission can cause the vehicle to lose power, stall, or become difficult to control, which can lead to accidents or leave the driver stranded.
symptoms: The vehicle hesitates or lurches when shifting gears
the transmission slips or hesitates when accelerating
the vehicle stalls or loses power
the transmission warning light comes on
the vehicle shakes or vibrates when shifting gears.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The failure of the clutch master cylinder can cause the clutch pedal to stick to the floor, making it difficult or impossible to shift gears, which can lead to accidents or leave the driver stranded.
symptoms: The clutch pedal feels soft or spongy
the clutch pedal sticks to the floor
the clutch pedal does not return to its normal position
the clutch pedal has a delayed return to its normal position.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The failure of the steering system can cause the vehicle to become difficult to control, which can lead to accidents.
symptoms: The steering wheel is hard to turn
the steering wheel shakes or vibrates
the vehicle pulls to one side
the vehicle loses power assist.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The failure of the engine mounts can cause the engine to move excessively, which can lead to damage to other components and affect vehicle performance.
symptoms: The engine moves excessively
the engine mounts are worn out
the exhaust system is damaged.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The failure of the HCU can cause the brake pedal to go to the floor, leading to a loss of braking power, which can result in accidents or leave the driver stranded.
symptoms: The brake pedal feels soft or spongy
the brake pedal sticks to the floor
the brake pedal does not return to its normal position
the brake pedal has a delayed return to its normal position
the brake pedal has a sudden loss of pressure
the vehicle is unable to stop or takes longer to stop.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The failure of the master cylinder can cause the brake pedal to go to the floor, leading to a loss of braking power, which can result in accidents or leave the driver stranded.
symptoms: The brake pedal feels soft or spongy
the brake pedal sticks to the floor
the brake pedal does not return to its normal position
the brake pedal has a delayed return to its normal position
the brake pedal has a sudden loss of pressure
the vehicle is unable to stop or takes longer to stop.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The failure of the brake hydraulic system can cause the brake pedal to go to the floor, leading to a loss of braking power, which can result in accidents or leave the driver stranded.
symptoms: The brake pedal feels soft or spongy
the brake pedal sticks to the floor
the brake pedal does not return to its normal position
the brake pedal has a delayed return to its normal position
the brake pedal has a sudden loss of pressure
the vehicle is unable to stop or takes longer to stop.
